summary: A TensorFlow Keras layer that implements the self‑output sub‑module for the text component of a BLIP model, managing weight initialization, building internal dense/normalization layers, and applying them during forward passes.
business_intent: Encapsulate the text self‑output transformation of the BLIP architecture so it can be reused in multimodal AI systems for tasks like image captioning, visual question answering, and other vision‑language applications.
